languages.text: {n}Вы проверяете все сервопротоколы кибермастифа, одну за другой давая команды. {petname} неукоснительно следует каждому приказу — с неотвратимостью орудия, сотворенного для службы Ему и его слугам. Зверь остается безукоризненно сосредоточенным до самой последней команды — эта машина готова верой и правдой служить самому Вольному Торговцу.{/n}

{n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы проверяете все сервопротоколы кибермастифа, одну за другой давая команды. {petname} неукоснительно следует каждому приказу — с неотвратимостью орудия, сотворенного для службы Ему и его слугам. Зверь остается безукоризненно сосредоточенным до самой последней команды — эта машина готова верой и правдой служить самому Вольному Торговцу.{/n}

{n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サイバーマスチフに次々とコマンドを出し、サーボプロトコルを徹底的に検証した。{petname}は一切の誤りなく命令に応じ、陛下に仕えるために作られた他の道具同様、冷酷なまでに忠実だった。獣は最後のコマンドまで完璧に集中力を維持していた。この機械は、ローグトレーダーに仕えるべく準備万端だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サイバーマスチフに次々とコマンドを出し、サーボプロトコルを徹底的に検証した。{petname}は一切の誤りなく命令に応じ、陛下に仕えるために作られた他の道具同様、冷酷なまでに忠実だった。獣は最後のコマンドまで完璧に集中力を維持していた。この機械は、ローグトレーダーに仕えるべく準備万端だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du probierst die Befehle des Cyber-Mastiff der Reihe nach aus und prüfst gründlich die Servoprotokolle. {petname} gehorcht völlig fehlerfrei, unbeirrt wie jedes andere Werkzeug, das für Seine Dienste geschaffen wird. Das Tier bleibt bis zum letzten Befehl perfekt konzentriert – diese Maschine ist bereit, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu dienen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du probierst die Befehle des Cyber-Mastiff der Reihe nach aus und prüfst gründlich die Servoprotokolle. {petname} gehorcht völlig fehlerfrei, unbeirrt wie jedes andere Werkzeug, das für Seine Dienste geschaffen wird. Das Tier bleibt bis zum letzten Befehl perfekt konzentriert – diese Maschine ist bereit, {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} zu dienen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous testez chaque ordre connu du cyber-mastiff afin de vérifier l'état de ses servo-protocoles. {petname} vous obéit au doigt et à l'œil, dévoué comme toute bête conçue pour être à Son service. La créature est parfaitement à votre écoute, toute son attention est consacrée à obéir {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous testez chaque ordre connu du cyber-mastiff afin de vérifier l'état de ses servo-protocoles. {petname} vous obéit au doigt et à l'œil, dévoué comme toute bête conçue pour être à Son service. La créature est parfaitement à votre écoute, toute son attention est consacrée à obéir {mf|au libre-marchand|à la libre-marchande}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pruebas las órdenes del cibermastín una detrás de otra, verificando meticulosamente el funcionamiento de sus servoprotocolos. {petname} las obedece todas sin el más mínimo error, tan implacable como cualquier otra herramienta creada para Su servicio. La bestia mantiene una concentración absoluta hasta el final; sin duda esta máquina está lista para servir {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}

La bestia mantiene una concentración absoluta hasta el final; sin duda esta máquina está lista para servir {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你一个接一个地尝试生化獒犬的命令，事无巨细地检查着伺服协议。在整个检查过程中，{petname}完美地服从着每个命令，没有一点错误，就像所有侍奉帝皇的工具一样毫无瑕疵。它保持着完美的专注，直到最后的命令结束为止——这台机器已经做好了侍奉行商浪人的准备。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service. The beast remains perfectly focused until the very last command — this machine is ready to serve the Rogue Trader.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Siber mastifin komutlarını deniyor, hizmoprotokollerini etraflıca inceliyorsun. {petname} tüm komutlarına hata payı bırakmadan uyuyor, O'nun hizmeti için yaratılan her araç gibi o da aman tanımaz bir yaratık. Son komuta dek odağını kaybetmeden söylenenleri harfiyen uyguluyor. Bu makine Hür Tacir'in hizmetine hazır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try out the cyber-mastiff's commands one after the other, thoroughly checking the servo-protocols. {petname} obeys every order without the slightest error, relentless as any other tool created for His service.
